@Rishi Gupta need some suggestions on the UI of user groups (I've divided them into "your" and "others" and added real-time sync for modification of groups). Currently "Your groups" and "Other groups" only show when you have those respectively, for example, if I have only "Your groups", then "other groups" would not be shown and vice-versa. :)

cool! I would say 

Your groups
You are not a part of any groups.

if you are not a part of any groups. Omitting "Other groups" is fine if there are no other groups.

There should also be no X to the right side of the user pills in the "Other groups" section, if that's easy to do. (We should also switch to the compose pills styling, though that's an independent project.)

@Rishi Gupta one quick clarification, is this what you meant to say -
"Your groups" and "Other Groups" generally if we have both.
"You are not part of any groups" if only non-editable groups exist.
"Your groups" if only editable groups exist. Am i right?
Also, I'll remove that exit (X) and for the styling I already have a separate PR #8702 :)

• If both exist, then show both
  • If only your groups exist, it should be
Your groups
group 1
group 2
...
  • If only other groups exist, it should be 
Your groups
You are not a part of any groups.

Other groups
group 1
group 2
...

This is same for both regular users and admins.

does that make sense / match what you are saying?
It matches with first two, in the last one shouldn't it be "You are not a part of any groups" only or should I show "Your groups" also ?
Ok cool, I now understood what are you saying, thanks! :)
